results.name: Number of 3 X n binary arrays with a path of adjacent 1's from top row to bottom row.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (15,-58,16).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(-2 z - 1)/(16 z^3 - 58 z^2 + 15 z - 1), {z, 0, 100}], z] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jun 24 2011 *)
xref: Cf. 1 X n A000225, 2 X n A005061, n X 2 A001333, vertical path of 1 A069361-A069395, vertical paths of 0+1 A069396-A069416, vertical path of 1 not 0 A069417-A069428, no vertical paths A069429-A069447, no horizontal or vertical paths A069448-A069452.
results.author: _R. H. Hardin_, Mar 22 2002
